Comments_List: How to do academic research, how to find resources, how to organize a long paper, how to read effectively.
Every philosophy major should write a senior essay. I enjoyed working with my advisor, Michael Della Rocca, very much.

Working on this senior essay was one of the most different, memorable and challenging experiences of my Yale career. It was the first time I embarked on such an independent project. I developed skills in choosing a topic and researching that topic, through finding readings that are pertinent to that topic. I cultivated skills in consolidating diverse readings on one topic and interpreting them in a unified, coherent way my essay. I also developed skills in writing a longer essay (about 25-35 pages) and in revising my writing.
The course will be different for everyone who takes it because we all have different advisors. I think that Michael was a great one; I dont have any improvements. We met almost every week.
